channel.title: Client Mp3
channel.description: What code can I put in my clients gui.java or client.java that will make it run an mp3 when the client loads. Please help thanks

item.title: Client Mp3
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Wrong section, try Client-section.

And try downloading a client with a working music-player, and copying/rewriting the scripts.[/quote]

MP3 is the most useless thing in the world, all it does is lag your client and in-game gameplay and most of the time players won’t even use it.

Read full topic
